<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We must reference VMCore in such a way that compilers will not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// delete it all as dead code, even with whole program optimization,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// yet is effectively a NO-OP. As the compiler isn&#39;t smart enough</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to know that getenv() never returns -1, this will do the job.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is so that globals in the translation units where these functions</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// are defined are forced to be initialized, populating various</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// registries.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (std::getenv(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;bar&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) != (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">char</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#42;) -1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">llvm::LLVMContext</a> Context;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="normal">      (void)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">new</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">llvm::Module</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, Context);</Highlight></CodeLine>
